Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1000000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations and deliver unparalleled benefits. I kindly invite you to consider this offer, knowing that it represents an outstanding opportunity for you to acquire a treasure that could significantly enhance your life or business. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
